item.title: Anthropic settles with authors in first-of-its-kind AI copyright infringement lawsuit
item.description: A U.S. district court is scheduled to consider whether to approve the settlement next week, in a case that marked the first substantive decision on how fair use applies to generative AI systems.

item.title: Under Trump, the Federal Trade Commission is abandoning its ban on noncompetes
item.description: Federal Trade Commission Chair Andrew Ferguson has called his agency's rule banning noncompetes unconstitutional. Still, he says protecting workers against noncompetes remains a priority.
